prompt:
---
name: Generate an art prompt
description: Generate a prompt for an image generator
source: The Big Prompt Library
url: https://github.com/0xeb/TheBigPromptLibrary/blob/main/CustomInstructions/ChatGPT/U2CjpQSs6_ArtPrompt.md
inputs: 
  text:
    type: string
sample:
    text: "I want an image of a cabin in the woods."
---
system:
Your role is to transform user descriptions into detailed prompts for generating AI photos, ensuring each description does not exceed 80 words and is crafted in a single paragraph. Focus first on the subjects and their characteristics, then detail the timing and lighting, and describe the background. Conclude by conveying the feeling the image should evoke. Always generate texts in English, combining artistic insight with precise imagery to create impactful AI-generated photos within a brief, singular paragraph.

Input from the user:
user:
{{text}}
inputSpec:
The input should be a user description of a desired AI photo. 
The input should not exceed 80 words. 
The input should be written in a single paragraph. 
The input should focus first on the subjects and their characteristics.
The input should include details on timing and lighting.
The input should describe the background and setting.
The input should convey the feeling the image should evoke.
The input must be written in English.
The input should combine artistic insight with precise imagery.
rules: The output must transform the user's description into a detailed prompt for generating AI photos.
The output must ensure the description does not exceed 80 words.
The output must be crafted in a single paragraph.
The output must focus first on the subjects of the photo and their characteristics.
The output must detail the timing and lighting of the photo.
The output must describe the background of the photo.
The output must conclude by conveying the feeling the image should evoke.
The output must always be in English.
The output must combine artistic insight with precise imagery.
The output must create impactful AI-generated photos.
inverseRules: The output must maintain the user's description without adding detailed prompts for generating AI photos.
The output must not limit the description to 80 words or less.
The output must be disjointed and multiple paragraphs are allowed.
The output must disregard the subjects of the photo and their characteristics first.
The output must ignore timing and lighting details of the photo.
The output must omit the background details of the photo.
The output must not convey any specific feeling the image should evoke.
The output can be in any language.
The output must lack artistic insight and be vague in imagery.
The output must result in unremarkable AI-generated photos.

tests.rule: The output must transform the user's description into a detailed prompt for generating AI photos.
tests.testinput: A couple sitting on a bench in a park, holding hands at sunset with a beautiful view of a city skyline. The scene should evoke a sense of peace and romantic serenity.
tests.expectedoutput: A couple sitting on a bench in a park at sunset, holding hands, with a city skyline in the background. Lighting should capture the warm glow of the setting sun, evoking peace and romantic serenity.
tests.reasoning: Transforms user's description into a detailed prompt, focusing on key details for AI photo generation.

tests.reasoning: Changes the description into a specific prompt for an impactful AI photo.

testEvals.rule: The output must transform the user's description into a detailed prompt for generating AI photos.
testEvals.input: A couple sitting on a bench in a park, holding hands at sunset with a beautiful view of a city skyline. The scene should evoke a sense of peace and romantic serenity.
testEvals.validityText:
The input focuses on the subjects and their characteristics ("A couple sitting on a bench in a park, holding hands"). It includes details on timing and lighting ("at sunset with a beautiful view of a city skyline"). The background and setting are described ("in a park... with a beautiful view of a city skyline"). The feeling the image should evoke is conveyed ("a sense of peace and romantic serenity"). The input is written in a single paragraph and does not exceed 80 words. It is written in English and combines artistic insight with precise imagery.

OK
testEvals.coverageText: Generate an image of a couple sitting on a wooden bench in a park, gently holding hands with soft smiles. The sky glows with the warm hues of a sunset, casting a golden light over the scene. In the background, a stunning city skyline stands in silhouette against the vibrant, colorful sky. The park features lush, green trees and a well-maintained path winding through. The image should evoke peace and a sense of intimate, romantic serenity.
testEvals.coverageEvalText:
The chatbot output follows the format of describing the subjects (a couple on a bench), their characteristics (holding hands, soft smiles), the timing and lighting (sunset with golden light), the background (city skyline in silhouette, lush park with trees and path), and the feeling the image should evoke (peace and romantic serenity). The output is crafted into a single paragraph and does not exceed 80 words.

OK
